t: “Amazon’s Choice” Recommends Some Obviously Crappy Products. Blame The Algorithm.
s: June 14, 2019 - One product, marked “Amazon’s Choice,” caught her eye, but when she received her order, the vacuum barely sucked up anything. “I took the “Amazon’s Choice” label as an endorsement by Amazon, although I later found out that’s more of an algorithmic term. I find that to be confusing at best, misleading at worst,” she told BuzzFeed News. “Amazon’s Choice is just our recommendation, and customers can always ask for specific brands ...
